title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option is not always available. The expected behavior is that either both options should be available or neither should be enabled.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option is sometimes not available.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option should either be available or disabled.
SR:
1. Select P1.
2. Select P2.
3. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project option.
